com.lacunasoftware.restpki - package com.lacunasoftware.restpki
 
complete(String, String, String, SecurityContext) - Method in class com.lacunasoftware.restpki.Authentication
Performs the final of two steps, receiving (1) the cryptographic nonce previously generated; (2) the user's certificate encoding; (3) the signature of the nonce and (4) a security context and yielding a ValidationResults.
completeWithWebPki(String) - Method in class com.lacunasoftware.restpki.Authentication

RestDecodeException - Exception in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Thrown to indicate that a REST request was successful but an error occurred while decoding its response.
RestErrorException - Exception in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Thrown to indicate that a REST request returned an HTTP status code indicating error and possibly a message, but no further information was returned.
RestException - Exception in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Base class for exceptions thrown when calling a REST API.
RestPkiClient - Class in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Class used to call the REST PKI API.
RestPkiClient(String, String) - Constructor for class com.lacunasoftware.restpki.RestPkiClient
Create a new instance of the class passing the URL for the REST PKI API and the access token to be used for authenticating with the service.
RestPkiException - Exception in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Thrown to indicate that the REST PKI API returned a specific error defined in the API.
RestResourceNotFoundException - Exception in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Thrown to indicate that a REST request was made but not resource was found at the requested URL.
RestUnreachableException - Exception in com.lacunasoftware.restpki
Thrown to indicate that a REST request failed due to network-related issues.
